/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, constructed of brick, exhibit a traditional Chinese architectural style, adding a touch of history and culture to the scene. The trees, lush and green, provide a vibrant contrast to the brick structures. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
